# Managing - Host Help Articles

**GENERATED**: 2025-11-27
**PARENT**: app/public/help-center-articles/hosts/

---

## DIRECTORY_INTENT

[PURPOSE]: Static HTML help articles about ongoing rental management
[PATTERN]: SEO-friendly pre-rendered HTML with shared CSS/JS
[AUDIENCE]: Hosts with active tenants and ongoing rentals

---

## FILE_INVENTORY

### payments.html
[INTENT]: Complete guide to payments and payouts
[TOPICS]: Payout schedule (24h after check-in), service fees (10-15%), direct deposit setup, tax reporting (1099-K), security deposit handling, cancellation refunds

### see-renters.html
[INTENT]: How to view and manage current renters

### notifications.html
[INTENT]: Notification settings and alerts

### verify-traveler.html
[INTENT]: Traveler verification process

---

## KEY_CONCEPTS

### Payment Flow
- Guest pays Split Lease at booking
- Split Lease holds funds in escrow
- Host paid 24 hours after guest check-in
- 10-15% service fee deducted (volume discounts available)

### Payout Methods
- Direct deposit (ACH) - free, 1-2 business days
- Debit card instant payout - 1% fee
- PayPal - varies by speed
- Wire transfer - $15 fee (international)

---

## TEMPLATE_PATTERN

All articles follow the standard help center HTML template:
- Split Lease main header with navigation
- Breadcrumb navigation (All Collections > For Hosts > Article)
- Article content with info boxes, tables, and structured headings
- Sidebar navigation linking to related managing articles
- Feedback section
- Shared CSS: `/help-center-articles/css/style.css`
- Shared JS: `/help-center-articles/js/split-lease-nav.js`
